phenomena.description: Changes in olfactory pathways due to spaceflight

phenomena.name: vasoconstriction
phenomena.description: Reduced vasoconstriction in cerebral arteries due to spaceflight

phenomena.name: vasodilation
phenomena.description: Impaired endothelium-dependent vasodilation in cerebral arteries due to spaceflight

phenomena.name: cerebral blood flow regulation
phenomena.description: Altered cerebral blood flow and vascular resistance due to spaceflight

phenomena.name: Bone adaptation to exercise
phenomena.description: Structural changes in bone (cortical and trabecular) in response to exercise-induced mechanical loading.

phenomena.name: Mesenchymal stem cell responsivity
phenomena.description: Changes in the population and differentiation of MSCs in response to exercise-induced mechanical loading.

phenomena.name: Unfolded protein response (UPR)
phenomena.description: Cellular signaling network to monitor protein-folding capacity in the endoplasmic reticulum (ER).

phenomena.name: ER stress
phenomena.description: Stress response due to accumulation of misfolded proteins in the ER.

phenomena.name: Cell fate decisions
phenomena.description: Role of IRE1 in promoting cell survival or apoptosis.

phenomena.name: Secondary metabolism
phenomena.description: Changes in secondary metabolic pathways due to reduced arogenate dehydratase expression

phenomena.name: Starch accumulation
phenomena.description: Transient overaccumulation of starch in response to genetic modification

phenomena.name: Photosynthetic electron transport
phenomena.description: Reduced photosynthetic electron transport rates due to genetic modification

phenomena.name: Olfactory bulb volume changes
phenomena.description: Alterations in the volume of the olfactory bulb, particularly in the granule and glomerular cell layers.

phenomena.name: Neurogenesis
phenomena.description: Formation of new neurons in the olfactory bulb.

phenomena.name: Cell death
phenomena.description: Increased density of apoptotic cells in the olfactory bulb.

phenomena.name: Alginate overproduction
phenomena.description: Activation of alginate biosynthesis in Pseudomonas aeruginosa through the AlgU pathway.

phenomena.name: Signal transduction
phenomena.description: Role of CupB5 in activating AlgW protease and its interaction with MucA and MucB.

phenomena.name: Intervertebral disc compression
phenomena.description: Compression of lumbar intervertebral discs under backpack loads

phenomena.name: Lumbar lordosis
phenomena.description: Changes in lumbar curvature under backpack loads

phenomena.name: Low back pain
phenomena.description: Pain perception in response to backpack loads

phenomena.name: Heat stress response
phenomena.description: Regulation of intracellular calcium levels and expression of heat-shock proteins and factors in response to heat stress.

phenomena.name: Protein expression regulation
phenomena.description: Altered expression levels of microsomal proteins, including annexin 1 (AtANN1), during heat stress.

phenomena.name: Anoxia tolerance
phenomena.description: Plant tolerance to oxygen depletion, relevant to submergence and flooding stress.

phenomena.name: Calcium signaling
phenomena.description: Role of intracellular Ca transporters in decoding and transmitting Ca signals during anoxia.

phenomena.name: Reactive oxygen species production
phenomena.description: Changes in ROS production post-anoxia, contributing to stress responses.

phenomena.name: Hormone signaling
phenomena.description: Altered hormone signaling pathways in response to anoxia stress.

phenomena.name: Attachment-independent biofilm formation
phenomena.description: Formation of biofilm without surface attachment under low-fluid-shear conditions.

phenomena.name: Repression of hfq expression
phenomena.description: Downregulation of the RNA chaperone Hfq in response to low-fluid-shear environment.

phenomena.name: Altered virulence characteristics
phenomena.description: Changes in virulence traits, including decreased carotenoid production, increased susceptibility to oxidative stress, and reduced survival in whole blood.

phenomena.name: muscle strength measurement
phenomena.description: Standardized measurement of muscle strength in C. elegans using a microfluidics-based system.

phenomena.name: neuromuscular function
phenomena.description: Assessment of neuromuscular function and degenerative processes in C. elegans.

phenomena.name: Extracellular purine release
phenomena.description: Release of ATP and ADP from plant roots in response to various stimuli.

phenomena.name: Calcium signaling
phenomena.description: Transient elevation of cytosolic free calcium in response to extracellular ADP.

phenomena.name: Stress response
phenomena.description: Plant responses to osmotic stress, wounding, and other stimuli.

phenomena.name: Antioxidant defense
phenomena.description: Role of σs-regulated antioxidant defense in stationary-phase E. coli resistance to gentamicin.

phenomena.name: Oxidative stress
phenomena.description: Generation of reactive oxygen species (ROS) and its impact on bacterial survival.

phenomena.name: Antibiotic resistance
phenomena.description: Mechanisms of gentamicin resistance in stationary-phase bacteria.

phenomena.name: Host-pathogen interactions
phenomena.description: Dynamic interplay between the host microenvironment and Pseudomonas aeruginosa

phenomena.name: Mucosal infections
phenomena.description: Infections of mucosal tissues by Pseudomonas aeruginosa, particularly in the lung

phenomena.name: Macrophage differentiation
phenomena.description: Differentiation of bone marrow cells into macrophages in the presence of rM-CSF

phenomena.name: Gene expression changes
phenomena.description: Changes in gene expression patterns during macrophage differentiation in spaceflight

phenomena.name: Cell surface marker expression
phenomena.description: Expression of CD11b, CD31, CD44, Ly6C, Ly6G, F4/80, Mac2, c-Fos, and c-Fms during macrophage differentiation

phenomena.name: RBC distribution in vortical flows
phenomena.description: Spatial distribution of red blood cells in response to vortical flow patterns in venous valve mimics.

phenomena.name: Flow patterns and shear stresses
phenomena.description: Analysis of complex flow patterns and wall shear stresses in venous valve pockets.
